name: Tabs
description: This component make it easy to explore and switch between different views by selecting a different tab.

properties.name: disabled
properties.label: Disabled
properties.settingTooltip: This handler allows you to disable a component.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to disable a component.

properties.name: variant
properties.label: Variant
properties.settingTooltip: This handler allows you to select variant of tab.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to select variant of tab.

properties.name: tabs
properties.label: Tabs
properties.settingTooltip: This handler allows you to add data to the component.
properties.handlerDescription: This handler allows you to add data to the component.

eventHandlers.name: onChange
eventHandlers.label: On Change Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event triggered when a tab is changed.
